## <img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/hvRJCLFzcasrR4ia7z/giphy.gif" width="28"> About Me

```yaml
name: Varun Gupta
located_in: India
current_job: Senior Software Engineer @ AntStack
education: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
fields_of_interest:
  - Cloud Architecture
  - Backend Systems
  - Serverless Computing
currently_learning:
  - Advanced AWS Services
  - Cloud-Native Patterns
  - AI integrations with Serverless
hobbies:
  - Building side projects
  - Open source contributions
  - Building my own products
```

- **Currently building** scalable cloud-native systems at [AntStack](https://github.com/antstackio)
- **Specializing in** TypeScript, Python & AWS serverless architectures
- **Exploring** distributed systems, data pipelines & cloud infrastructure
- **Open to collaborating** on backend, cloud & open-source projects
- **Reach me at** [varung848@gmail.com](mailto:varung848@gmail.com)
